fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two players to swap their roles at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability only works on members of the same faction.
- You cannot swap the role of a player whose role has been publicly revealed for any reason.
- You may not swap your own role.
- You have Basic Defense until you are attacked for the first time.
- You may no longer use your ability and you lose your defense after you have achieved your win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Swap two players' roles three times.
